CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 28, 1952, pg. 6 reads: "Belmar Buyers - The Milton Thompsons, who plan to move from Bedford Dwellings to Belmar Gardens. Milton Jr. is shown between his parents. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait Milton Thompson, Milton Jr. wearing horizontal striped shirt, and Mrs. Milton Thompson, posed in their home in Bedford Dwellings
